product_name: Merrell Chameleon 5 Mid Ventilator Waterproof Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: The lightweight Merrell Chameleon 5 Mid Ventilator waterproof hiking boots offer the support, protection and traction you need to handle rugged trails. Durable pig suede leather uppers with abrasion-resistant nylon mesh panels offer flexibility and ventilation. Waterproof linings boast a high level of breathability while retaining complete protection against moisture. Nylon mesh linings wick away excess moisture and dry quickly for comfort; AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment helps keep odors at bay. Removable 2mm EVA insoles add cushioning to compression-molded EVA midsoles for a soft, cradled feel. External heel stability arm increases support, making these boots ideal for use with a medium pack. Nylon shanks offer torsional stability and protection underfoot, increasing confidence on varied terrain and reducing rock bruising. Vibram(R) outsoles on the Merrell Chameleon 5 Mid Ventilator waterproof hiking boots feature TC5+ rubber for durable traction on the trails.
short_description: The lightweight Merrell Chameleon 5 Mid Ventilator waterproof hiking boots offer the support, protection and traction you need to handle rugged trails.
